solution_line_template: Marianne is {marianne_initial_age} - {bella_initial_age} = <<{marianne_initial_age}-{bella_initial_age}={age_difference}>>{age_difference} years older than Bella.
So, Marianne will be {marianne_initial_age} + {years_to_add} = <<{marianne_initial_age}+{years_to_add}={marianne_final_age}>>{marianne_final_age} years old then.
